title: It Ain't You It's Me
lyrics:
Barefoot front porch swingin', here all alone tracing my steps Tryna figure out what went wrong
You were here one minute then the next you leave
Now I'm stuck here tryna breathe
You know that saying "it ain't you, it's me"
But it ain't you that's been going through hell

It ain't you with a heart to sell

It ain't you riding 'round this town

With a ghost in the shotgun seat

It ain't you that's been tryna call

It ain't you that still misses it all

You ain't the one that can't move on, still holding memories

It ain't you, it's me



When times were tough I just couldn't throw away

Them old T-shirts and pics of us still framed

I talk so loud they can feel my pain

The echo of you was here today

I'm just stuck tryna find what it means



But it ain't you that's been going through hell

It ain't you with a heart to sell

It ain't you riding 'round this town

With a ghost in the shotgun seat

It ain't you that's been tryna call

It ain't you that still misses it all

You ain't the one that can't move on, still holding memories

It ain't you, it's me

Yeah it's me



But it ain't you that's been going through hell

It ain't you with a heart to sell

It ain't you riding 'round this town

With a ghost in the shotgun seat

But no, it ain't you that's been tryna call

It ain't you that still misses it all

You ain't the one that can't move on, still holding memories

It ain't you, it's me
